Text: Thank you so much!  I now have all the books I have been looking everywhere for!

Thanks a ton for this.  I have been looking for these for years.  You are awesome!!  Xanth series is my favorite.  You are missing a few at the end of the series, so if you ever get them, please upload and let me know thanks!
should be noted - Weilding a Red Sword cuts out partway through page 43. otherwise, i love it, and many thanks!
thx alot, some of my favs
